programme.title: Police Car Song and more
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: Watch brave Police Car saving the day! You're watching "Police Car Rescue Team Special", a fun and exciting Police Car Songs & Story compilation presented by Pinkfong!

programme.title: Baby Shark Back to School
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Baby Shark Back to School
programme.desc: After an exciting summer vacation, Baby Shark is back at school! Join Baby Shark for a day in the life after the new school term begins.

programme.title: Baby Shark Fire and Rescue Play
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Episode 3
programme.desc: Baby Shark Fire Rescue Team, Go! Brave Baby Shark rushes to help friends in danger—anytime, anywhere! Join exciting rescue missions and become a hero firefighter!

programme.title: Pinkfong and Ninimo Songs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Episode 2
programme.desc: Join Pinkfong and Ninimo on a colorful, exciting adventure in the world of play! From rainbow color games to lively hide-and-seek and even mysterious adventures— what fun activities will be waiting for us this time? With Pinkfong and Ninimo, the joy and excitement are doubled!

programme.title: Super Safeguard Sammy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Episode 2
programme.desc: Help me, Sammy!' Our hero Sammy is here to rescue friends in need! Explore safety tips through lively rhymes and engaging games. Let’s get started!

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs for Children
programme.sub-title: S01 : E30 Fun Rhyming Songs
programme.desc: Sing, Dance and Learn Rhymes and Words with Pinkfong and Friends!

programme.title: Baby Shark Special Song
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: Doo doo doo doo doo doo! For all fans who love our Baby Shark songs, here we are with baby shark songs compilation. Everybody, Let's go and have some fun!

programme.title: Bebefinn
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Episode 5
programme.desc: Baby Finn Learns Something New Everyday with the Funn Family! Here comes another beautiful precious day of Finn, a Baby Shark lover just as our children, and his Family. Enjoy the daily life of the Bebefinn Family filled with joyful songs.

programme.title: Bebefinn
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Episode 6
programme.desc: Baby Finn Learns Something New Everyday with the Funn Family! Here comes another beautiful precious day of Finn, a Baby Shark lover just as our children, and his Family. Enjoy the daily life of the Bebefinn Family filled with joyful songs.

programme.title: Baby Shark Boulevard
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: Baby Shark, the beloved global star, is on the move! To meet fans from all around the world, Baby Shark is setting out on an exciting journey. Join the adventure and meet Baby Shark!

programme.title: Kikipuppup
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: Meow Meow, Woof Woof! Bickering Again Today! Meet the cute rivals, Kiki & Puppo— and… Vex! A fun story about a cute cat and dog, sharing little laughs, heartwarming moments, and tiny bits of growing up every day!

programme.title: Hide 'n Seek with Shark Family
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Episode2
programme.desc: Oh no~! Shark Family is missing! Baby Shark is off on a singing adventure to find them — but he needs your help! Come on, friends! Let’s sing along and help Baby Shark bring the family back!

programme.title: Pinkfong Colors Halloween
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Episode 2
programme.desc: Learn Halloween special colors with Pinkfong and Wonderstars friends!

programme.title: Bebefinn
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Episode 4
programme.desc: Baby Finn Learns Something New Everyday with the Funn Family! Here comes another beautiful precious day of Finn, a Baby Shark lover just as our children, and his Family. Enjoy the daily life of the Bebefinn Family filled with joyful songs.

programme.title: Bebefinn BEST Songs of The Year
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: Mommy, thank you for being there, loving me, putting up with me, listening, your patience, and everything!

programme.title: Stop and Think!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Stop and Think!
programme.desc: Learn how to use media the right way with Baby Shark!

programme.title: Baby Shark Stole My Heart Again!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E01 Baby Shark Stole My Heart Again!
programme.desc: Baby Shark, the sparkling superstar of the universe! Thanks for loving us for 10 years—are you ready for even more songs and dances?

programme.title: Pinkfong & Hogi: New Friend Ninimo
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Episode 5
programme.desc: One day, Pinkfong’s magical powers and memories of home planet Staria slowly start to disappear, and a mysterious cat named Ninimo appears! But even without the magical powers and memories, Pinkfong discovers the magic of friendship in Wonderville.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: Oh no, it looks like you have a tooth injury, so you've come to the dentist! Dr. Baby Shark will take care of everything for you! Alright, let's start the treatment. Please open wide and say "Ahh"!

programme.title: Pinkfong Wonderstar
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Episode 5
programme.desc: Codi decides to make a Bumbleberry Pie for sad Rachel. But...what is Bumbleberry? What does it look like? We heard that it's amazingly delicious… Coco's poetry went missing! With the help of Wonderstar, Coco finds the whereabouts of the disappeared manuscripts. Wait...is that Pat the goat, who is eating paper...? Would Pat be the culprit?

programme.title: Pinkfong Wonderstar
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Episode 6
programme.desc: Pinkfong and Hogi are invited to a dance party. Pinkfong is super excited but Hogi is so nervous.The night has come and a suspicious sound comes out from Wonderstar's house! Catch the thief! What? It's Hogi practicing dance! Wonderville is in danger! Pinkfong and Hogi figure out that there was something wrong with Poki's pancake machine. Stop it before the whole village is covered with pancakes!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bruno's Forgotten Hits 1980-1989
programme.desc: 120 videos, In order, a forgotten hit from each & every month of the 80s. Radio 1 legend Bruno Brookes is the man with the 10 hour musical plan!

programme.title: Forgotten Hits - All Day!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Forgotten Hits - All Day!
programme.desc: Lesser known songs you may have forgotten from artists you'll certainly know!

programme.title: Who Did This First?! Top 40
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Who Did This First?! Top 40
programme.desc: Would you believe that these 40 massive melodies were originally sung by someone else! Find who did it first as we play hits by Soft Cell, Tina Turner, Phil Collins & Donna Summer.

programme.title: Genesis vs Queen!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Genesis vs Queen!
programme.desc: Battle of the mega groups from the 80s! Are you a fan of Freddie or are full of Phil?

programme.title: Beat v FunBoy v Madness v Specials
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Beat v FunBoy v Madness v Specials
programme.desc: Brummie 2-Tone legends The Beat slug it out against Coventry's Terry Hall with his mates from The Specials and Fun Boy Three as Suggs and the Camden Nutty Boys watch on. FIIIIIGHT!

programme.title: Def Leppard v Bon Jovi!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Def Leppard v Bon Jovi!
programme.desc: It's Sheffield v New Jersey in our battle of the 80s rock gods!

programme.title: 80s Flashback Frenzy!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 80s Flashback Frenzy!
programme.desc: Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights & iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made the 80s!

programme.title: The Jam v The Police '80-'83
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Jam v The Police '80-'83
programme.desc: They dominated the indie world in the first 4 years of the 80s - and here are 11 of their biggest hits, in order.

programme.title: 80s Flashback Frenzy!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 80s Flashback Frenzy!
programme.desc: Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights & iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made the 80s!

programme.title: Hall & Oates: 1980-1985
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Hall & Oates: 1980-1985
programme.desc: With limited chart success in the UK, we sometimes forget how huge Hall & Oates were in the early 80s - worldwide they became the most successful duo of all time!

programme.title: 80s Flashback Frenzy!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 80s Flashback Frenzy!
programme.desc: Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights & iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made the 80s!

programme.title: Erasure: 1986-1994
programme.desc: From their debut hit Sometimes in 1986 - here's an hour of Erasure in their late 80s & early 90s pomp - every song made the UK top 10!

programme.title: Make Mine A Double with Pat Sharp!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Make Mine A Double with Pat Sharp!
programme.desc: They says 2 heads are better than one & in the 80s the charts were full of collaborations. So pour a large one & have double the fun with Pat Sharp's top 40 duets.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 I'll Name That Tune In One!
programme.desc: Only the anthems from the brightest decade of pop - the 1980s. You'll be able to recognise all these tune from their very first note!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 100 Love Songs for Valentine's
programme.desc: Simon Bates with the ultimate countdown of 80s love. Yes - 100 songs with heartfelt vocals, lush strings & big breakdowns in a 9 hour marathon! Expect Whitney, Lionel & George.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Love At The Movies! with Pat Sharp

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 80s School Disco Top 50
programme.desc: Slap on some tight denim, fake tan, designer stubble and leather jackets - and that's just for the girls! This is how we partied in the disco-bopping 80s!

programme.title: 25 Dead Catchy Choruses!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 25 Dead Catchy Choruses!
programme.desc: We challenge you not to sing along to some of the biggest pop choruses of the 80s. From Black's "Wonderful Life" to Baltimora's "Tarzan Boy" - you'll need to turn this up loud!

programme.title: 40 Years On - 1986's Best Sellers!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 40 Years On - 1986's Best Sellers!

programme.desc: Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights & iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made 1986!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 New Wave Anthems!
programme.desc: Non-stop punk & new wave the cool kids were listening to in the latter half of the decade - expect skinny jeans, safety pins, guitars & a few snarls!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 50 Years On - 1976's Best Sellers!

programme.title: 1976 Unleashed!

programme.title: Bring On The Karbs
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Sunday Dinner
programme.desc: Chefs Erica and Josh Karbelnik go head-to-head to see who can come up with the most tantalizing Sunday dinner! Josh makes roast chicken with herbs de Provence, while Erica prepares two kinds of pasta!

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Egg Episode with Chef Katie Ardington
programme.desc: Eggs are a perfect beginning for so many recipes and meals; Chef-host Katie Ardington is happy to "whisk" us along through a few of her favourites!

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 Tomato Episode with Chef Natalia Machado
programme.desc: Join our host, Chef Natalia Machado as she introduces us to her favourite techniques for using a wide variety of versatile, savoury tomatoes.

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Rich and Delicious
programme.desc: Baking is indulgent - especially when making rich and delicious treats! Host Jessica McGovern shares some foolproof recipes for all things rich.

programme.title: Holiday Eatz
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Valentine's Day
programme.desc: Love is in the air for this Valentine's Day edition of Gusto's Holiday Eatz"... your party menu resource starring supERS-fun kitchen dynamo, Chef Kimberly Lallouz! First base? How about tempura oysters with a kiss of strawberry? Up next, it's straight from the 'heart' with an artichoke tart featuring melty cheese, homemade crust, and fresh herbs. Lamb Chops with Beurre Rouge are the main event, served rare and dusted with freshly ground pink peppercorns. Kimberly wraps things up with a fun new take on Chocolate and Roses - pressing white chocolate ice cream between rosewater spiked sugar cookies. It's a heart-stopping finale worthy of your favourite rom-com!

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Lombardy
programme.desc: Celebrity Chef Michael Bonacini prepares traditional dishes from the Northern Italian region, Lombardy.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Veneto
programme.desc: Home to popular Italian dishes like Tiramisu, Chef Michael Bonacini explores cuisine from Italy's Veneto region.

programme.title: Zach Kinda Cooks
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Spaghetti & Meatballs
programme.desc: Lazy and curmudgeonly chef and ex-Gusto writer Zach cooks one of his all-time favorite dishes – Spaghetti and Meatballs! While cooking, he tells aimless stories, cracks bad jokes, and berates Sydney, the beleaguered camera person.

programme.title: Zach Kinda Cooks
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Mexican Lasagna
programme.desc: Lazy and curmudgeonly chef and ex-Gusto writer Zach cooks one of his all-time favorite dishes – Mexican Lasagna! While cooking, he tells aimless stories, cracks bad jokes, and berates Sydney, the beleaguered camera person.

programme.title: Gusto's QR Countdown
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Salmon
programme.desc: Unlock Gusto TV's top recipes on QR Countdown! Thousands of viewers scan our QR codes to access our delicious dishes. Now. we're serving up 8 of our most popular cornbread recipes. from hosts like Natalia Machado and Spencer Watts.

programme.title: Everyday Excellent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Make Mine Mediterranean
programme.desc: With only 30 minutes and the clock ticking, can Vanessa make a Mediterranean-inspired meal for 4 for about 40 bucks? On the menu: salmon with cherry tomatoes and capers, chickpea salad, lemon garlic rostis, and a peach dessert!

programme.title: Global Street Eats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Rice to the Occasion
programme.desc: Chef Dev whips up some of his favorite rice dishes from his travels around the world. including Japanese Onigiri Rice Balls. Fresh and Fried Spring Rolls in rice paper wrappers from Vietnam. and Beef Waterfall Salad with toasted rice powder from Thailand.

programme.title: Global Street Eats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Onion Odyssey
programme.desc: Chef Dev prepares some of his favorite street food dishes from around the world that feature onions. including Seeni Sambol Buns from Sri Lanka. a Blooming Onion from the USA. and Scallion Pancakes from South Korea.

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Rainbow Galaxy Party
programme.desc: Nothing is more mesmerizing than outer space! Host Jessica McGovern bakes delicious desserts with a galaxy-inspired twist.

programme.title: Bring On The Karbs
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Sunday Dinner
programme.desc: Chefs Erica and Josh Karbelnik go head-to-head to see who can come up with the most tantalizing Sunday dinner! Josh makes roast chicken with herbs de Provence, while Erica prepares two kinds of pasta!

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Fish on the Grill
programme.desc: Fish. Flaky, flavoursome, and perfect for barbeque. High energy host Spencer Watts tests out his grill with delightfully tender fish dishes.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Chicken and Corn
programme.desc: Chicken and corn are the key players in this letter “C” challenge. Chef Lauren Gulyas prepares one of her favourite Italian dishes, chicken Marsala. Using garlic, shallots, and white wine, Chef Lauren whips up a rich Marsala sauce that is nutty and floral in flavour. Next, she transforms corn into a creamy polenta topping for her Shepard’s pie...with a twist! Sautéing onion, garlic, and lean ground beef, she uses Worcestershire sauce and tomato paste to give the pie filling an extra flavour boost. Once she finishes those dishes, Chef Lauren creates a mouth-watering recipe that combines both chicken and corn.

programme.title: Everyday Excellent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Make Mine Mediterranean
programme.desc: With only 30 minutes and the clock ticking, can Vanessa make a Mediterranean-inspired meal for 4 for about 40 bucks? On the menu: salmon with cherry tomatoes and capers, chickpea salad, lemon garlic rostis, and a peach dessert!

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Mango and Mustard
programme.desc: “A” is on the menu and Chef Robert Jewell takes on this meal challenge with apricots and avocados. First up, Robert cooks a spicy roasted quail and drizzles it with some sweet apricot and calvados sauce. Next, is a meal best served cold! Robert slices up sushi-grade tuna and transforms it into a flavourful tartare, brought to life by rich avocado and refreshing lime. On the side, he adds crusty crostini with savoury soy sauce and sesame oil, the perfect complement for this meltin- your-mouth meal. For his final dish, Robert combines apricots and avocados for an unbelievably tasty dish.

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Rich and Delicious
programme.desc: Baking is indulgent - especially when making rich and delicious treats! Host Jessica McGovern shares some foolproof recipes for all things rich.

programme.title: Holiday Eatz
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Valentine's Day
programme.desc: Love is in the air for this Valentine's Day edition of Gusto's Holiday Eatz"... your party menu resource starring supERS-fun kitchen dynamo, Chef Kimberly Lallouz! First base? How about tempura oysters with a kiss of strawberry? Up next, it's straight from the 'heart' with an artichoke tart featuring melty cheese, homemade crust, and fresh herbs. Lamb Chops with Beurre Rouge are the main event, served rare and dusted with freshly ground pink peppercorns. Kimberly wraps things up with a fun new take on Chocolate and Roses - pressing white chocolate ice cream between rosewater spiked sugar cookies. It's a heart-stopping finale worthy of your favourite rom-com!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Spice
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on spicy sauces! First up, a Cajun comeback sauce for soft-shelled crab! Next, a classic steakhouse mustard sauce and a ginger caramel sauce for ginger caramel apples!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Wine
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on wine sauces! First up, a classic veal marsala! Next, a white wine chicken gravy and a port sabayon with grapes!

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 White Fish Episode with Chef Katie Ardington
programme.desc: Skilled Chef Katie Ardington is excited to introduce her favourite fish, striped sea bass, in this fabulous voyage through the 7 seas of seafood cookery.

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 Chicken Episode with Chef Natalia Machado
programme.desc: Chef-host Natalia Machado loves chicken, and who doesn't? Chicken is enjoyed around the world for good reason; it is versatile and reliably delicious!

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E07 Salad Episode with Chef Craig Wong
programme.desc: Salad is a wonderful addition to any meal, and sometimes even a meal on its own"... today, the talented Chef Craig Wong shares several of his superior salad ideas.

programme.title: Cook Like A Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E08 Pork Episode with Chef Derek Dammann
programme.desc: Snout to tail cooking is Chef Derek Dammann's specialty, in this episode celebrating pork, he cooks everything but the squeal!

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Liguria
programme.desc: Famed Chef Michael Bonacini celebrates the food of the Italian Riviera as he shows viewers delicious dishes from Liguria.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Emilia Romagna
programme.desc: Emilia Romagna is the culinary heart of Italy and Chef Michael Bonacini shows viewers how to make some of the region's most delicious dishes.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Trentino-Alto Adige
programme.desc: Renowned Chef Michael Bonacini takes viewers on a culinary tour of the Italian region of Trentino-Alto Adige without leaving his own kitchen.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Basilicata
programme.desc: Charming host Chef Michael Bonacini explores the mountainous region of Basilicata with a feast fit for any celebration. Beginning with an antipasto that caters to the region's southern heat, Michael stuffs crunchy sweet peppers with ripe tomatoes, savoury anchovies, and fresh oregano. Moving on to the primo, Michael cooks up a creamy Vermicelli Frittata. Using leftover pasta, he combines eggs with cheese, anchovies, and chili flakes for extra flavour to make a classic Basilicata dish. Michael cooks up Pollo Alla Potentina, a traditional meal from the Feast of Saint Gerard. This hearty chicken stew is sure to heat up your core, using hot peppers as the base of the meal. For his final dish,...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Georgia + Hong Kong
programme.desc: Join Bianca Osbourne to taste and combine! Fun CombiNATION Plates host Bianca Osbourne starts this episode with an inspired tribute to Georgian cuisine; Beef Tartare with Tkemali (sour plum sauce), marigold powder, and tart, crunchy pickles. Next; feast your eyes on her unique Hong Kong dumpling: plump scallops, pork, and veggies are blended, rolled, steamed, sliced, and then served with Crispy Yu Choy and XO. The common ingredient is rabbit! Georgia offers up Rabbit 'Mtsvadi', grilled and glazed with pomegranate reduction. Hong Kong represents with Sweet and Sour Rabbit, Grilled Pineapple and Red Pepper Coulis. Finally, Georgian Milk Braised meets Chinese/Hong Kong-style Roast Duck with...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 South Korea + Spain
programme.desc: CombiNATION Plates host Bianca Osbourne is always looking for the best food in the world to share. The first stop is South Korea with her Sesame Crusted Tuna 'Yukhoe', a delicious blend of favourite Korean flavours. Next stamp on the passport? Spain! Mouth-watering Duck Breast is seared and served rare with a crispy artichoke heart, membrillo, olives, and sweet-savoury sherry reduction. Beef short ribs are the common ingredient with Catalonian Braised and Romesco to one side and sticky Korean Kalbi-style grilled to the east! For the topper, drool over Bulgogi Octopus simmered and served with saffron-scented Sticky Rice Paella cakes, finished with crispy Paprika-Gochujang battered mussel....

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Ethiopia + Brazil
programme.desc: Travel the world without ever leaving the kitchen! Intrepid host of CombiNATION Plates, Bianca Osbourne, starts this episode with Ethiopian inspired Berbere Spiced Quail, seared in aromatic Niter Kibbeh, and served with crunchy-sour Gomen Salad. Brazil is next, check out this re- invention of Feijoada... with braised and seared pork belly, oranges, crema, and fresh black bean salsa. Common ingredient 'Coffee and Sweets' is next... with java-spiked Injera Crepe Cake for Ethiopia and Brazil blending up a dark roast of rich, coffee-spiked, chocolatey Brigadeiros truffles. The final plate is Coconut Crusted Black Cod with cheesy Brazilian-style Pao de Queijo bites, and teff flour a brush of...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Morocco + Thailand
programme.desc: Join CombiNATION Plates host Bianca Osbourne for a trip to Morocco and Thailand! First up, whole Red Snapper is rubbed with earthy Ras el Hanout spice, poached in argan oil, and served with char-grilled oranges. Thailand inspires the next plate; Chicken Thigh 'Lollipop', roasted and served with bamboo shoots, chilies, and sauced with peanut-coconut red curry. Next, these countries both love Spring Rolls... Morocco's version, Briouat, is stuffed with saffron couscous and fresh cheese and fried... from Thailand comes a salad roll with shrimp and mango, dipped in a fiery green Nam Jim. Stick around for the big dish - Saffron buttERS-basted beef Striploin, served with complex Apricot-Green...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Endive and Eggplant
programme.desc: Showcasing the unique flavours of endive and eggplant, Chef Lauren Gulyas receives the letter "E" for her cooking challenge. She sets sail by creating an endive salad boat, the perfect delivery vessel for her smoked trout with creÌ€me fraiche, and goat cheese with walnut appetizers. She follows up with a stuffed baby eggplant, Moroccan style! Chef Lauren sauteÌs onion and garlic with some smoky sweet paprika and a snip of savoury sage, the aromatic combination lends itself beautifully to the succulent flavour of lamb. For her grand finale, Chef Lauren prepares the pieÌ€ce de reÌsistance using both endive and eggplant.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Shrimp and Sausage
programme.desc: It's all about the letter "S" as Chef Robert Jewell cooks up tasty meals using shrimp and sausage. For his first recipe, Robert fries up turmeric-spiced sweet potato fritters with a shrimp centre. He takes this tantalizing appetizer to another level with a savoury lime soy dipping sauce. Next up, Robert makes an English breakfast strata. This sausage casserole is easily the BEST way to start your day. He layers the bottom of the dish with buttered sourdough slices, before adding crispy fried sausages, leeks and tomatoes. He then covers it in a creamy egg mixture, crumbles stilton on top and bakes it to golden brown. Finally, Robert combines shrimp and sausage into one flavourful dish.

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Italy + China
programme.desc: Join engaging host, Bianca Osbourne, for a taste of two countries. First stop? Italy! Check out her recipe for succulent wild boar ribs, braised until tender, rolled in gremolata, and served over silky polenta. Next up? A culinary tribute to China, pairing lobster claw with chili oil, pomelo foam, and oyster sauce glazed bok choy. Every episode features a 'common ingredient', this time? It's noodles! Drool over two recipes: Italian classic Olio e Aglio next to chewy Chinese long Noodles tossed with Sichuan Chili Oil. For the big finale, Bianca blends Italian style with Chinese flavour for a one-of-a-kind CombiNation Plate: Kung Pao Pork Osso Bucco over Forbidden Black Rice Risotto... made...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Turkey + Indonesia
programme.desc: Turkey, think Silk Road spices. Indonesia, lots of seafood and tropical fruits! Curious and adventurous host Bianca Osbourne is your CombiNATION Plates culinary guide through both food cultures. First, check out Turkish Spice Crusted Lamb Rack with yogurt and blistered peppers. Next, an Indonesian tribute: Crab Leg with Coconut Curry. For the 'common ingredient'? Two takes on tender, savoury eggplant! Turkish Eggplant is braised and served with parsley and feta and the Indonesian take is served with fried garlic and sweet soy. For the CombiNATION Plate? Peanut- chili Sate sauce replaces walnut for Pazili TrancÌ§a, a classically Turkish halibut presentation, also served here with unique,...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Canada + Greece
programme.desc: From Canada to Greece, CombiNATION Plates always covers lots of ground! Kicking off, host Bianca Osbourne wows with ubERS-Canadian Roasted Venison Loin, yummy Fiddlehead Pancakes and sweet-tart Cranberry sauce. Next, enjoy a scenic Mediterranean vacation on a plate with her completely new approach to Greek Salad, taken up a notch or two with tasty seared Albacore Tuna! This episode's 'common ingredient' is lamb shank; check out two wildly creative re- inventions; first, of Canadian TourtieÌ€re, and then, Greek Dolmades. For a final recipe, a dessert fit for a lumberjack or a Greek god! Oka Saganaki with McIntosh Apple Butter and Maple Loukoumades; made with nutty Canadian Oka cheese,...

While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Bulgaria Sofia
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Food Fact Fun Amsterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 10 Days Scotland Edinburgh (ENG)
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Xplore Bulgaria Plovdiv
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 10 Days Scotland Perth (ENG)
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 City Breaks Ahmedabad (ENG)
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2020
programme.sub-title: S01 : E28 Coldwater Classic Series 2010 - Documentary
programme.desc: The Cold Water Classic events feature $15,000 for the winner of each event and $50,000 for the series winner. The Cold Water Classic is the first series of its kind and takes place in some of the world's rougher surf spots.

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 WOF 2025 #04: Maneuvre Vancouvre - with Hans Rey
programme.desc: In “Maneuver Vancouver”, mountain bike icons Hans Rey, Steve Peat and Wade Simmons embark on an exciting five-day journey through Vancouver. Join these three legends as they explore this iconic city.

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 WOF 2025 #05: 10 Years LAAX OPEN Documentary
programme.desc: The Laax Open has been a meeting place for winter sports fans for years. See the best riders, breathtaking performances and unforgettable moments that have shaped the history of freestyle culture.

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 WOF 2025 #06: Queen & King of the Court Finals 2024
programme.desc: The stage is set for the 2024 Queen & King of the Court Crown Series Finals in Qatar! The best beach volleyball players will compete against each other in the Aspire Zone. From December 12-14, the best athletes in the world will battle it out for the title.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup & GWA Wingfoil World Cup - Dakhla (MAR)
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup and the GWA Wingfoil World Cup in Dakhla, Morocco, bring together the best kite surfers and wingfoilers in the world. The riders show off their technical skills and innovation in the wave riding disciplines.

programme.title: iQFOiL U23 World Championships - Live delayed Part 2
programme.desc: Portimão, Portugal, welcomed the world's best windsurfers to the iQFOiL U23 World Championships from September 6 to 13, 2025. The venue is known for its Atlantic winds, waves, and extreme racing conditions that challenge even the most experienced competitors

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2026 - WOF 2026 _03_ GKA Kite-Surf World Championship 202
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: ON Surf
programme.desc: ON Surf - A Collection of Italian Surf Movie Classics. Starring the most inspiring surfers around the globe including Leah Dawson, Ale Ponzanelli and many more.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2025
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Cape Epic 2025 - Stage 6
programme.desc: The Cape Epic 2025 is one of the world's most important mountain bike stage races in the rugged landscape of South Africa. The event promises intense competition and unforgettable adventures

programme.title: Cape Epic 2025
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Cape Epic 2025 - Stage 7
programme.desc: The Cape Epic 2025 is one of the world's most important mountain bike stage races in the rugged landscape of South Africa. The event promises intense competition and unforgettable adventures

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 - Jericoacoara (BRA)
programme.desc: Jericoacoara/Brazil welcomes the Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024, where the world's best kiteboarders test the limits of big air. This hotspot provides a stage for breathtaking jumps, technical tricks and intense competitions.

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2024 - Sibiu (ROU) - 150min Leatt LiveManiacs Summary
programme.desc: In this year’s 21st edition of the event, competitors from about 60 nations will be competing, among them the world’s best hard enduro riders like Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Mario Roman (ESP) and Teodor Kabakchiev (BUL).

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 WOF 2023 #07: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Stop #1 - Baqueira Beret (ESP)
programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 startet im Januar in ihre 16. Saison - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus aller Welt! Der erste Stopp der Tour findet in Baqueira Beret statt.

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 WOF 2023 #08: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Stop #2 - Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 hat ihren zweiten Stopp in Ordino Arcalís Pro, Andorra - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus der ganzen Welt! Damit kehrt die FWT in das Freeride-Mekka der Pyrenäen zurück.

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 WOF 2023 #09: Mediterranean Epic 2023
programme.desc: Die 4. Edition des Mediterranean Epic ist der Auftakt der Mountainbike-Etappenrennen. Es ist ein 4-tägiges Rennen (UCI Hors Catégorie), das in Castellón, Oropesa del Mar (Spanien), stattfindet.

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 WOF 2023 #10: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Stop #3 - Kicking Horse Golden BC Pro (CAN)
programme.desc: Der 3. Stopp der Freeride World Tour 2023 bringt uns nach Kanada zum Kicking Horse Golden BC Pro, (CAN).

programme.title: One Water Race 2024
programme.desc: The concept is straight forward; starting at Arholma in the north, the first to reach Landsort in the south is crowned the winner. Running and swimming the only method of movement. No track and free choice of route but with some unknown check points needed to pass along the way.

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 WOF 2024 #11: Mediterranean Epic 2024
programme.desc: The Mediterranean Epic offers an UCI 4 stage race where mountain bikers enjoy mountain biking to the fullest during the route around Oropesa del Mar - Castellón (Spain).

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024
programme.sub-title: S01 : E25 WOF 2024 #25: Profile – Jakob Schubert & Highline Wendestein
programme.desc: Today we dive into the world of alpine sports. In the first part of the show, we look at the greatest achievements of the austian climber Jakob Schubert. Afterwards we turn to a high-wire act by highliner Lukas Irmler, who faces a special challenge in his home mountains

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Ibiraquera (BRA)
programme.desc: Ibiraquera in Brazil is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, which brings together the best kitesurfers in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in wave riding and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Cape Verde hosts the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the world’s best kite-surfers. Athletes from around the globe compete for the title, showcasing impressive skills in wave-riding and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 WOF 2025 #07: Motosurf World Championship Finals
programme.desc: Welcome to World of Freesports and to the Motosurf World Championship Finals from Macao, China, where the world’s top motosurfers battle for glory against a breathtaking backdrop of speed and precision. Who will conquer and claim the ultimate title?

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 WOF 2025 #08: International Marathon Gorges de l’Ardèche
programme.desc: The Marathon International des Gorges de l'Ardèche is an annual canoe and kayak race in France. Participants navigate a 27-kilometre course through the breathtaking Ardèche Gorge.

programme.title: WOF Evergreens
programme.sub-title: S01 : E51 Swatch Timeline - This Is My Winter
programme.desc: Experience the mountain with the myth-Xavier De Le Rue. There are so many moments so many adventures so many ways of seeing the mountains. You only need a few magic days to film a part for a snowboard film. But this season it took me six months - so: This is my winter.

programme.title: WOF Evergreens
programme.sub-title: S01 : E52 Mammut Project 360 Grad
programme.desc: "Project360" takes digital mapping into the third dimension and makes the legendary Eiger North Face a virtual experience. A view through the eyes of the climber, directly from the wall. The impressive 360° panorama of the walls: www.project360.mammut.ch

programme.title: WOF Evergreens
programme.sub-title: S01 : E53 Roopkund - Mountainbike Expedition to the Indian Himalaya
programme.desc: Hans Rey, Richie Schley and Joscha Forstreuter travelled to the Indian Himalayas to the mysterious Roopkund Lake, which is known for having hundreds of ancient human skeletons lying dormant at its bottom. This is followed by a descent of 3,500 metres in altitude.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf & Hydrofoil Big Air World Cup - Sylt (GER)
programme.desc: Sylt is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf & Hydrofoil Big Air World Cup 2024, which brings together the best riders in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in wave riding and big air hydrofoiling.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, which brings together the best kitesurfers in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in surfing and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: Golden Fly Series Genf (SUI) 2024 - Part 2
programme.desc: Geneva will host the Golden Fly Series 2024 athletics spectacle for the first time! On Saturday 21 Sep, the world's best long jumpers and pole vaulters will be competing for important world ranking points on the largest mobile World Athletics-certified athletics facility in the world.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight’. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 11, Romania
programme.desc: Situated in the very heart of the Carpathian Mountains, Sibiu is a Romanian town where the climate is pleasantly mild, offering some of the best weather conditions for a strongman event around Europe. All this, without doubt, set the mood for the high results and showtime vibes in Stage 11 of Strongman Champions League. The competition in Sibiu was organized in six different disciplines

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 12, Curacao
programme.desc: From now on every stage of these series will be more than crucial. Curacao is a beautiful Dutch island in the Caribbean, with a great atmosphere to hold another stage of the MLO Strongman Champions League. Let’s see who takes the title here and who will secure a place in the next stage.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 13, Jordan
programme.desc: Ten of the world’s strongest men gathered in Amman to compete in Jordan’s first-ever Truck-Pull Championship. The contestants race against the clock while pulling a 21-ton truck across the track. One of the most fierce competitors to take part in the event was four-time winner of the World’s Strongest Man competition, Brian Shaw.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 14, Greece
programme.desc: Taking place in Corinth, Greece, considered by many the cradle of the sports competition games, an epic strongman battle will mark the last stage before the upcoming big two-day season’s finale in Chetumal, Mexico. In front of more than 5000 spectators, the twelve athletes compete in Log Lifts, Card Deadlift, Conan’s Wheel and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E15 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 15, Mexico World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first day of the two-part finale sees the strongest men competing in Carry and Drag, Dumbbell Lift and the Truck Pull. Everything is possible in this heated fight for the crown against the backdrop of stunning Chetumal, Mexico.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E16 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 16, Mexico World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: On the second day of the grand finale of the 2017 Strongman Champions League, the athletes have a last chance to secure the medals in the spectacular four events Weight for Height, Deadlift Cars, Forward Hold and The Loading Medley. Be prepared for stunning performances – and even world records!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 1, Norway - World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: Season 2018 begins with 14 strongest men in the world, all competing for the title. The competition kicks off in Norway. We’ll see typical Viking disciplines, team events and world records in heavy conditions in the land of snow and ice. They will suffer, they will freeze and fight in this first competition of the year for the title that they will carry on their shoulders throughout whole year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 2, Germany - FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capichampions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2018 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 3, Abu Dhabi
programme.desc: For the first time in history, Strongman Champions League will set up competition in Abu Dhabi. The line-up of super athletes, who are part of the SCL, includes former world champions Dainis Zageris (Latvia) & Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland), current world champion Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and biggest strongman in the World Sean O’Hagan (Ireland).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Strongman classic in land where there is no place for anything else excepts strength, fight and endurance. Here are fourteen of the strongest men, fighting for the title of strongest in Holland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: We go back to Holland, where former champion Dainis Zageris is in leading position after the first three events. Alongside Radzikowski, he is in this moment favorite for world title, and also leader shirt holder.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 6, Finland
programme.desc: Stage six of Strongman champions league, 2018 is set back on north, in Finland. Here we have Matjaz Belsak, wearing SCL leader shirt, one of the biggest strongman in the World Mika Torro, fan favorite strongman in all over the World – Will Baggott, and also big name from Baltic – Aivars Smaukstelis

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: Twelve strongman, including defending Worldchampion Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia , will compete on “Air spa” for the title of best in homeland country of Tesla, Pupin, Novak Djokovic. Matjaz Belsak is the SCL leader in this competition, chasing his third victory this season.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 8, Finland - U105 (Part 1)
programme.desc: The World championship in lightweights of the Strongman Champions League bring to us 50 strongmen from all over the world. All athletes are under 105 kilograms and for them this is the step up to the ultimate heavyweights.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 9, Finland - U105 (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this second stage of the World championship of lightweights we will find out who out of the 12 athletes will win the title in the under 105 kilogram category.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 10, Romania (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of SCL Romania 2018 will be hosted in Brasov. This episode features a new event for Strongman Champion League: “ The Chopper Pull”!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E11 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 11, Romania (Part 2)
programme.desc: After three classical Strongman events – Dead lift, Loading and Front hold – and one historical, Chopper Pull for the first time in history of Strongman, now we go to find out who will take title in Romania. This is the second stage in Romania and it remains to be seen who will win the title; Aivars, Travis or Krzyzstof?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 12, Curacao (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next destination of Strongman Champions League is in a piece of paradise on earth – Curacao. We bring to you some special Strongman events like the Rock Lift, Tug of War and Weight for Height in this episode.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E13 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 13, Curacao (Part 2)
programme.desc: This is the last competition before the grand finals. After the first three events Zageris is in top place, but can O’Hagan, Baggott, Petursson and Ortmayer step into the final? Last chance some of them will find through events like Forward Hold, Truck Pull, Dead Lift and loading very big objects.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E14 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 14, Road to Mexico
programme.desc: We bring you 50 minutes of Strongman inside. Fears, inspiration, courage, the best and worst from our finalists and their expectation of the finals. We also go to Poland and Germany to represent one day in the training of Krzysztof Radzikowski and Dennis Kohlruss. See all the finalists for Mexico in their comfort zone here, with their backgrounds /motivations /family and friends.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 15, Mexico - World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of the Strongman Champions League 2018 finals in Mexico. The last twelve athletes all pushing their boundaries and testing their limits to take the World title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E16 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 16, Mexico - World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: After 11 months and 14 competitions all over the world, it all comes down to the final in this episode. The strongmen must show their best skills and every mistake is expensive, so their concentration must be at the highest possible level. Will Krzysztof manage to take off back or will Dainis maintain his lead?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 1, World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: This year 14 athletes from all over the world came to Fefor to compete in 6 cruel events. We'll see typical Viking disciplines on very heavy conditions in land of snow and ice, World records and athletes like the title defender Krzysztof Radzikowski, strongest guys from Holland and Germany and many more

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 SCL S6 Ep2 FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capita in the World and of course, the most powerful host in Strongman champions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2019 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 3, Turkey
programme.desc: On a spectacular beach in Alanya, the MLO Strongman Champions League Turkey was viewed by thousands of spectators over a two day battle. With 12 athletes at the start over 6 cruel events, like Marble Stone Lift, Truckpull and Deadlift cars. And with the comeback of Travis Ortmayer / USA, former stone king and world ranked competitor. Winner of several SCL stages in the past.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Four times Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter competing here in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, and 3 in this episode: The first event, a truckpull of 17.000 kg over 25 meters in max 75 seconds, was a real hard pull Also for the World Champion Truckpull, Holland’s runner-up Kelvin de Ruiter, but watch his amazing technique here.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter, competing in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, 3 in this second episode; a Viking-press of 150 kg with the current world record holder Luke Herrick. The fifth event, a front hold of 25 kg is loved or hated by the athletes and lastly, the Stones of Strength.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 6, Russia
programme.desc: An unbelievable TANK PULL of 50.000 kg was at the stage of SCL RUSSIA. Never seen this before! Not only a tank pull was done here but also the Viking Press/ Deadlift Max and Log lift reps were spectacular events to see here in Russia. With Mikhail Koklyaev also as event presenter, the former top 3 world strongest man from Russia was there

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E07 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: In this year’s edition on The Balkan Peninsula, we have competing the new talent from Estonia Marko Remlik together with Sebastian Kurek from Poland and yellow leader Kelvin de Ruiter

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E08 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland and Aivars Smaukstelis from Latvia are the strongman future of these days. Mateusz is the best man in the World at the moment to defeat. Only 25 years and such a fantastic strongman. They come here only for a win. But there are 12 more Strong athletes in this episode who want the title of Finland as well.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E09 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Mateusz Is leading after day 1 (previous episode) with close behind him Aivars Smaukstelis and Zake Muluzi from the UK. All very exciting! 5 events in this episode: Log Lift, Fram Walk, Deadlift, Sack Throw (Weight for Height), Loading medley.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E10 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 10, Portugal
programme.desc: In this stage we have a new strong debutant: Oleg Sylka from the Ukraine. He is the new talent, who will stand up against the old champions like ZSydrunas Savickas and Brian Shaw and the Stoltman Brother from the UK. This new talent Oleg is a great character and we will see him flame in the episode in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E11 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 11, Callio
programme.desc: In Callio is the deepest mine of Europe/ 1500 meter deep, whereas the MLO Strongman Champions League also did 1 event. The Forward Hold, on a 1500 dept/ also a kind of new record/ as it was never done before. Spectacular and new in Strongman sport.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E12 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 12, Ukraine
programme.desc: Kelvin de Ruiter is here to defend his SCL World Truck Pull Championships title. But this year, another strong field wants his title. Over 3 different pulls with 3 different trucks, and 14 athletes at the start, it will be difficult for everybody.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E13 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 13, Caribbean
programme.desc: SCL edition Curacao 2019 was a great event, twelve power boys from all over made a great show at the white beaches, and 35 degrees Celsius heat in the Carrabean Islands. Two events were held on Friday at the beach of beautiful resort Sunscape, the other three were held near the world famous floating bridge at Willemstad on Saturday night.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E14 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 14, Dubai
programme.desc: Hosted at Meydan Grandstand in Dubai, the Strongman Champions League had some really big names in the list like Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland, Brian Shaw from the USA and Krzysztof Radzikowski. In front of the Burj Khalifa the athletes do the deadlift max and 4 other heavy events at another spot in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E15 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. The last stage over 2 episodes of the MLO Strongman Champions League, were held in Porto, Portugal. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E16 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results and this is the final!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: The spectacular Fefor Arena hosted for the 8th time the Worlds Strongest Viking, part of the SCL World Series. But with the absence of former title holders its anyones game. Again, a very spectacular episode of the Strongman Champions League here in Norway.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 GLORY 2 Brussels
programme.desc: From the Forest National in Brussels, Belgium on October 6, 2012. This event featured a super fight between Remy Bonjasky and Anderson Silva as headliner, Also this event featured non-tournament super fight series.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S11 : E03 GLORY 81 Dusseldorf
programme.desc: Headlined by the exciting and long-awaited rematch between GLORY heavyweights Jamal Ben Saddik and Benjamin Adegbuyi. Also featuring the first title defence for GLORY middleweight champion Donovan Wisse against up and comer Juri de Sousa.

programme.title: K1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E47 K1 World Grand Prix: Finals, Tokyo, 2003
programme.desc: K-1 World Grand Prix 2003 Final was a kickboxing event promoted by the K-1 organization. The event was held at the Tokyo Dome in Tokyo, Japan on Saturday, December 6, 2003 in front of 67,320 spectators. It was the eleventh K-1 World Grand Prix final involving ten of the world's best fighters (two being reservists). The eight finalists had almost all qualified via preliminary events, while two additional fighters were invited as reserve fighters (for more detail on this see bulleted list below), with all bouts being fought under K-1 Rules (100 kg/156-220 lbs).

programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 GLORY 3 Rome
programme.desc: From the PaloLottomatica in Rome, Italy on November 3, 2012. This event featured the Glory 70kg Slam Tournament final 8 Quarter Finals, Semifinals and Final. Albert Kraus withdrew from the tournament due to the flu and was replaced by Yoshihiro Sato.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S11 : E05 GLORY COLLISION 4
programme.desc: Headlining the event is the highly anticipated trilogy fight between kickboxing legends Badr Hari and Alistair Overeem. In a bout over a decade in the making, Hari and Overeem will end their rivalry on the biggest stage in the sport after splitting first round knockouts with each other during the late 2000s.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 GLORY 4 Tokyo

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S11 : E07 GLORY 82 Bonn
programme.desc: The event will be headlined by an exhilarating heavyweight matchup between No. 1 ranked contender Antonio Plazibat and No. 10 ranked contender Raul Catinas. Co-headlining the event is a Welterweight Title Bout between Alim Nabiyev and Endy Semeleer. Also featured on the card, MMA veteran Joilton Lutterbach will make his GLORY debut against fellow debutant Mark Trijsburg in a welterweight bout. Top-five lightweight contender Itay Gershon will make his return to the GLORY ring against promotional newcomer Cihad Akipa. The card will also mark the return of perennial heavyweight contender Jahfarr Wilnis, who will be making his first appearance on the GLORY stage since 2019. He will meet...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E02 GLORY 83 Essen
programme.desc: Headlining the event is a Light Heavyweight Title Fight between current Champion Sergej Maslobojev and top ranked contender Donegi Abena. A Middleweight Title Bout between Champion Donovan Wisse and current number one contender Cesar Almeida will serve as the event’s co-headliner. Also featured on the card is a middleweight bout between top-five contenders Serkan Ozcaglayan and Sergej Braun. Plus, perennial lightweight contender Guerric Billet will meet Cihad Akipa. GLORY 83 will also mark the promotional debuts for both Uku Jurjendal and Nabil Khachab, who will square off against each other in a heavyweight bout. Additionally, rising featherweight contender Ahmad Chikh Mousa will look to...

programme.desc: Hard Knocks 48 continues with some of the best fights in MMA! Mitch Carlson is welcomed back to HK cage by John "" The Dragon"" Nguyen in the amateur matchup of the night. This episode is rounded out by an entertaining pro contest between two MMA heavyweight veterans: Lee Mein vs. Lloyd Marshbanks.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europe's leading MMA shows, since it's inception in 2006 it's has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. With top match making throughout the fight cards, they have been touted as some of the biggest and toughest fights in the UK. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 This is Fate S2 E26
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.sub-title: S01 : E374 Trinayani S1 E374
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Guddan S2 E16
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E373 Undercover Love S1 E373
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E36 Gangaa S2 E36
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.sub-title: S03 : E113 Mehek S3 E113
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Maitree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E128 Maitree: The Rules of Love S1 E128
programme.desc: The lives of three friends, Nandini, Maitree and Ashish get inexplicably intertwined when an accident brings unexpected changes in their lives.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E374 King of Hearts S1 E374
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E374 Second Chances S1 E374
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S04 : E66 Jodha Akbar S4 E66
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Veere Di Wedding
programme.desc: Childhood friends Kalindi, Avni, Sakshi, and Meera reunite for Kalindi's wedding. Kalindi, hesitant due to her parents' troubled marriage, calls off the wedding amidst the chaos of Rishabh’s loud family. Avni, a lawyer, faces pressure from her single mother to marry. Sakshi seeks divorce from her husband Vineet, and Meera's marriage to John, a foreigner, is unaccepted by her uncle. Together, the friends help each other resolve their issues.

programme.title: Pal Pal Dil Ke Paas
programme.desc: Orphaned at a young age, Karan Sehgal owns 'Camp Ujhi,' an elite trekking club in Manali. Saher Sethi, a top vlogger, takes up an assignment to review the camp to avoid a family reunion. Suspecting a scam due to high prices, she aims to expose it, but Karan promises a life-changing experience. After a week of thrilling adventures, they fall for each other. Just as everything seems perfect, Saher's ex-boyfriend appears, intent on separating them.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E371 King of Hearts S1 E371
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S03 : E173 Maserati Ghibli
programme.desc: With the Ghibli, Maserati advanced into a more affordable market segment. But the competition is strong. In addition: taking the Maserati GranCabrio MC on a cruise through the Alps.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E129 Jaguar F-Type
programme.desc: Jaguar found their way back to the world of sports cars. The F-Type is able to take on the competition like the BMW Z4. We also took a closer look at two other competitors, the Porsche Boxster S and Nissan's 370 Z.

programme.title: Top 10 Show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E38 The Most Beautiful Vintage Cars
programme.desc: There are classic cars that are undisputed beauties when it comes to design and look. We take a look at our top 10 most beautiful classic cars.

programme.title: Top 10 Show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 The Most Successful Cars in the 24h Race
programme.desc: 24-hour races are one of the toughest tests for man and machine in motor racing. We present the most successful cars in this racing category in our Top 10 list.

programme.title: Top 10 Show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 The Most Successful Cars in the 24h Race
programme.desc: 24-hour races are one of the toughest tests for man and machine in motor racing. We present the most successful cars in this racing category in our Top 10 list.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E94 Audi at Le Mans
programme.desc: At the 2012 Le Mans 24 Hours, Audi entered the R18 e-tron quattro for the first time. Also: the Porsche Cayenne GTS, the model between the S and the Turbo. And: the Mercedes-Benz CLS Shooting Brake.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E117 Million-Dollar Toys from the Middle East
programme.desc: The McLaren MP4 12C Spider, one of many high-performance sports cars featured at the Doha Motor Show in Qatar. Also: the creations of manufacturers like Lamborghini, Bertone or Porsche but also the first Arab super sports car, the Lykan HyperSport.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E104 Lamborghini
programme.desc: Sant'Agata Bolognese, the home of the iconic Italian sports car manufacturer Lamborghini, is the perfect place to take a look under the hood of the different Gallardo models. Also: cruising through Rome in an Aventador LP700-4.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E45 50 Years Corvette Stingray
programme.desc: 1963 saw the launch of the Chevrolet Corvette Stingray, the brand's answer to established sports car models by Jaguar, Maserati and others. Many consider it to be the most exciting sports car of all time. We pay tribute to this classic.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E34 The Advantages of All-wheel Drive
programme.desc: We took the all-wheel model of the Mazda CX-5 off the road in order to test its terrain capabilities. In addition: what does the third generation of BMW's so-called SAV X5 have to offer? And: Kia's compact SUV, the Sportage.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E60 Typically German
programme.desc: What are the characteristics of a typical German car? Do stereotypes like functionality, reliability but also a certain dullness paint a realistic picture? Also, we explored if the Volkswagen Golf GTE could bring new impulses to the brand's model range.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E116 Open-Top Sportscars
programme.desc: The Audi R8 V10 Spyder's design and sophisticated technology was meant to set an example for what a car manufacturer is capable of. In addition: the Wiesmann Roadster MF5. And: Porsche's house tuner Ruf turned up the volume with their RT 35 model.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E118 Batman's Dreams: Supercars in Acceleration
programme.desc: The clash of the convertibles, the Nissan 370 Z in comparison to Porsche's Boxster S. Also: the exclusive one-off high-performance sports car Maybach Exelero. And: a dream of a sports car, a vehicle of superlatives, the Bugatti Veyron Vitesse.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E129 Jaguar F-Type
programme.desc: Jaguar found their way back to the world of sports cars. The F-Type is able to take on the competition like the BMW Z4. We also took a closer look at two other competitors, the Porsche Boxster S and Nissan's 370 Z.

programme.title: Top 10 Show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 The Ten Most Fuel-efficient Cars
programme.desc: Not everyone can afford to pay vast sums of money for fuel. We present our top 10 most economical cars in terms of fuel consumption.

programme.title: Top 10 Show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E30 The Best Beastly Car Names
programme.desc: Car models are named after all sorts of things, from countries to ancient deities to animals. We take a look at the top 10 cars named after animals.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 The Ambulance
programme.desc: Stunt coordinator Domi’s latest idea for the Stunt Heroes team involves an old ambulance that is prepared so that the stuntman can jump right through the ambulance with his car.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 The Pile-Up
programme.desc: Fog, darkness and a pileup involving multiple cars, the Stunt Heroes want to recreate such a scene as part of a stunt with burning people, a fireman who arrives late at the scene and a car that flies through the air.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S03 : E173 Maserati Ghibli
programme.desc: With the Ghibli, Maserati advanced into a more affordable market segment. But the competition is strong. In addition: taking the Maserati GranCabrio MC on a cruise through the Alps.

programme.desc: There are classic cars that are undisputed beauties when it comes to design and look. We take a look at our top 10 most beautiful classic cars.

programme.desc: 24-hour races are one of the toughest tests for man and machine in motor racing. We present the most successful cars in this racing category in our Top 10 list.
